conversations.body_text:
Still no refund Verstuurd vanaf mijn iPhone Op 2 jul 2025 om 12:07 heeft service@simsonn.com het volgende geschreven: ﻿ 
 
 Hi GD Smit We would like to acknowledge that we have received your request and a ticket has been created. A support representative will be reviewing your request and will send you a personal response.(usually within 24 hours). To view the status of the ticket or add comments, please visit https://simsonn.freshdesk.com/helpdesk/tickets/1104?follow=email Thank you for your patience. View ticket If the button doesn't work, copy-paste this URL in your browser's address bar: https://simsonn.freshdesk.com/helpdesk/tickets/1104?follow=email Regards, simsonn Support Team 





 
 




1104:4206036

But if it takes longer than the said two days You can better re send with ups or dhl I told mine frend driver of team redline He wil go respond on facebook I asked him not do it give change to solve fast Its up to you Verstuurd vanaf mijn iPhone Begin doorgestuurd bericht:
Hi GD Smit,     We have refunded you, if you still need it, please place a new order, we currently have plenty of stock and will choose UPS Express to ship it to you.
